replies.bodyText: @jomarko This PR is comprehends the redesign of the placeholder page, by following @lclay2 designs. In the UX designs, the placeholder text for this bar is "Search data types". Regarding disabling the magnifier icon, it will be separately handled here: https://issues.redhat.com/browse/DROOLS-5001.
replies.author: karreiro

timeline.bodyText: Is it ok we have different button text if there is no data type, and if there is >0 data types?

replies.bodyText: DataTypeListView.AddACustomDataType follows a design validated and tested by the UX team. Personally, I agree with their decision, since different contexts can have different and more expressive texts.
